Hello! I'm Sarah

A software engineer graduate from Vancouver. I started learning web development for the past 2 years, have tried my hands on mobile application development as well prior to that. Keen on diving more into front-end design, but also fairly competent in back-end. And on the side, I do graphic designing.

Battle of the Ages

  • Mobile Application
  • Android
  • Front-end

Battle of the Ages is an Android battle card game that uses a NIOSII microprocessor to link multiplayers into one gameplay session. Together with three other students, we built this game under the guidance of Professor Thor during our ECE381 course.

To build Battle of the Ages, we had to planned and designed different aspect of the game such as multiplayer connectivity, audio playability through the NIOSII processor, event synchronization and android application programming. I contributed in managing audio playability and the front-end interface design which includes both programming and designing images.

Sticky Rice Travel
  • Website
  • Responsive

While at Sabah Borneo, I worked with Sticky Rice Travel to redesign and add new functionalities to their website to further improve user experience. My part includes interactive map, sorting products according to interests and mobile responsiveness.

Child First

  • Website

Child First project was founded by Kota Takaoka Reserach Lab to improve the accessibility of reporting child abuse cases to the appropriate child protection services. Together with 3 other students, we built a prototype for this project using AngularJS, Bootstrap and PHP. My part includes designing the front-end interface and linking the website to an external server for database storage.

Olympia

  • Hybrid Mobile Application

Olympia is a prototype mobile application that targets audiences who are keen on keeping themselves updated with the latest news on all ongoing Olympic events. As a project course, we built Olympia using Ionic framework (Javascript and HTML/CSS). My part includes designing the front-end interface.
